IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: GOULD ACADEMY PREPARES ACADEMICALLY MOTIVATED STUDENTS FOR COLLEGE AND HELPS THEM TO BECOME INDEPENDENT-MINDED, ETHICAL CITIZENS WHO WILL LEAD LIVES OF PURPOSE, ACTION, EXCELLENCE, AND COMPASSION IN A DYNAMIC WORLD. THE SCHOOL SERVES APPROXIMATELY 243 BOARDING AND DAY STUDENTS.
IRS990.MissionDesc: GOULD ACADEMY PREPARES ACADEMICALLY MOTIVATED STUDENTS FOR COLLEGE AND HELPS THEM TO BECOME INDEPENDENT-MINDED, ETHICAL CITIZENS WHO WILL LEAD LIVES OF PURPOSE, ACTION, EXCELLENCE, AND COMPASSION IN A DYNAMIC WORLD.
IRS990.Desc: TAUGHT AND EDUCATED ONE STUDENT AT A TIME THROUGH STRONG STUDENT-FACULTY RELATIONSHIPS THAT REFLECT A DEEP KNOWLEDGE OF EACH STUDENT AS AN INDIVIDUAL AND THAT FOSTER SOUND WORK HABITS, A STRONG SENSE OF SELF CONFIDENCE, TEAMWORK, AND LEADERSHIP SKILLS, AND PRINCIPLED DECISION-MAKING.ENSURED THAT EVERY GOULD STUDENT BENEFITED FROM EDUCATION OF THE WHOLE PERSON THROUGH RICH AND CHALLENGING, YET SUPPORTIVE, ACADEMIC, CO-CURRICULAR, AND COMMUNITY LIFE PROGRAMS THAT PROMOTE DEVELOPMENT ACROSS ALL DOMAINS OF PERSONAL GROWTH.HELPED STUDENTS EXPLORE THE WHOLE WORLD THROUGH ACADEMIC ENGAGEMENT WITH MAJOR GLOBAL THEMES, IMMERSION OF DIVERSE CULTURES, MEANINGFUL EXPERIENCE IN THE NATURAL WORLD, AND DIRECT INVOLVEMENT IN INITIATIVES THAT PROMOTE ECOSYSTEM AND ENERGY SUSTAINABILITY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE OVERALL GOAL OF THE ENDOWMENT FUNDS IS TO BALANCE THE OPERATING AND NON-OPERATING FUNDING NEEDS OF THE ACADEMY WITH THE LONG-TERM PRESERVATION AND GROWTH OF THE ACADEMY'S ASSETS.

THE ACADEMY FOLLOWS THE PROVISIONS OF FASB ASC 741-10 ACCOUNTING FOR UNCERTAINTY IN INCOME TAXES. THIS STATEMENT CLARIFIES THE CRITERIA THAT AN INDIVIDUAL TAX POSITION MUST SATISFY FOR SOME OR ALL OF THE BENEFITS OF THAT POSITION TO BE RECOGNIZED IN AN ENTITY'S FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. IT ALSO PRESCRIBES A RECOGNITION THRESHOLD OF MORE LIKELY-THAN-NOT, AND A MEASUREMENT ATTRIBUTE FOR ALL TAX POSITIONS TAKEN OR EXPECTED TO BE TAKEN ON A TAX RETURN, IN ORDER FOR THOSE TAX POSITIONS TO BE RECOGNIZED IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. THERE WAS NO CUMULATIVE EFFECT ON THE ACADEMY'S FINANCIAL STATEMENTS RELATED TO FOLLOWING THESE PROVISIONS, AND NO INTEREST OR PENALTIES RELATED TO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS WERE ACCRUED. THE ACADEMY IS CURRENTLY OPEN TO AUDIT UNDER THE STATUTE OF LIMITATIONS BY THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE AND STATE TAXING AUTHORITIES FOR THE YEARS ENDED JUNE 30, 2013 THROUGH 2016.
FINANCIAL AID 3,716,545. BAD DEBT EXPENSE - ADD BACK 2,000.
FINANCIAL AID 3,716,545. BAD DEBT EXPENSE RECLASSED FROM DECREASE IN REVENUE 2,000.
INCLUDED ON EVERY ENROLLMENT AGREEMENT AND IN EVERY ADMISSION VIEWBOOK.

STUDENTS SEEKING FINANCIAL AID ACCESS A STUDENT SCHOOL SERVICES (SSS) APPLICATION FROM THE SCHOOL'S WEBSITE. THE COMPLETED APPLICATION IS THEN SENT TO SSS WHO PROCESSES AND SENDS A HARD COPY TO THE SCHOOL WITH AN AMOUNT THAT SSS HAS DETERMINED THAT THE FAMILY CAN PAY TOWARD BOARDING AND DAY TUITION. THE ADMINISTRATION OFFICE AT THE SCHOOL THEN USES THIS INFORMATION TO HELP MAKE THE FINANCIAL AID DETERMINATION.
HOUSING RESIDENCE - AS A BOARDING SECONDARY SCHOOL, WE MANDATE CAMPUS HOUSING FOR CERTAIN EMPLOYEES.

TaxExemptBondsIssuesGrp.PurposeDesc: REFINANCE EXISTING BONDS & FUND RENOVATIONS TO HANSCOM HALL.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: AUDIT COMMITTEE REVIEWS AND THEN REPORTS TO THE FULL TRUSTEE BOARD, THE FULL BOARD DOES NOT REVIEW.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE SCHOOL ASKS BOARD MEMBERS AND SENIOR STAFF TO FILL OUT A CONFLICT OF INTEREST FORM ANNUALLY AND KEEPS THEM ON FILE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: COMPENSATION COMMITTEE OF BOARD REVIEWS ALL SENIOR STAFF AND COMPARES DATA.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 18
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE SCHOOL MAKES THESE FORMS AND RETURNS AVAILABLE THROUGH THE GUIDESTAR WEBSITE AND ARE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE SCHOOL DOES NOT MAKE THESE DOCUMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC.
NO CHANGE IN THE SCHOOL'S PROCEDURES. PROCESS IF HANDLED BY THE AUDIT COMMITTEE.
